actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: Joint resolution to establish the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire lands in order to establish the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge within the Owens River watershed area in California. Declares that the tule elk shall be deemed a species of wildlife threatened with extinction for purposes of the Land and Water Conservation Fund Act.

titles.title: Joint resolution to establish the Tule Elk National Wildlife Refuge.
